title: Weekly Horoscope Pisces, January 12-18, 2025 predicts physical well-being - Hindustan Times
summary:
Weekly Horoscope for Pisces: January 12-18, 2025 – Focus on Physical Well-being

Date: January 12, 2025

Source: Dr. J.N. Pandey

This week, Pisces, you'll find clarity in relationships, boost career prospects, and manage finances wisely while focusing on emotional and physical well-being.

  • Effective communication improves relationships.
  • Career opportunities increase, allowing for talent showcase.
  • Financial caution is advised; review spending habits.
  • Health should be prioritized; include exercise and balanced diet.

Notable Quotes:

This week offers you a chance to deepen your emotional connections.

The week encourages teamwork at work to achieve success and set long-term goals.

Maintain a strong work ethic to advance in your career.

Conclusion:

This week is pivotal for Pisces in terms of personal growth, emotional health, and professional opportunities.

Official: Thalapathy69 is the remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari - 123telugu
summary:
Official: Thalapathy69 is the remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari

Published on Jan 12, 2025

Thalapathy Vijay is currently working on his last film, Thalapathy69, which will be his focus before shifting entirely to politics. The film is directed by H. Vinoth and is in production, with confirmatory remarks about its basis being a remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari.

  • Thalapathy Vijay has shown a keen interest in Bhagavanth Kesari, watching it five times.
  • VTV Ganesh confirmed the remake at a promotional event, detailing Vijay's involvement and his initial reluctance from other directors to adapt the film.
“Vijay sir liked Bhagavanth Kesari pretty much. He watched the film for five times.” - VTV Ganesh

This news heightens anticipation among fans of both Vijay and the original film.
newTitle: Thalapathy69 Confirmed as Remake of Bhagavanth Kesari

title: Madha Gaja Raja Movie Review: A self-aware, largely entertaining throwback - TOI Etimes
T'gana govt withdraws orders allowing ticket price hike for Ram Charan starrer 'Game Changer' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Telangana Government Withdraws Ticket Price Hike for 'Game Changer'

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Telangana government announced the withdrawal of orders that allowed a hike in ticket prices for the film 'Game Changer' starring Ram Charan. This decision follows directives from the High Court regarding public interest, health, and safety.

  • The government had initially allowed an increase in ticket prices by ₹150 for multiplex and ₹100 for single theatres for shows on January 10.
  • From January 11 to 19, an additional ₹100 and ₹50 was permitted for multiplex and single theatres, respectively.
  • Early morning shows are now prohibited until further notice.
“The government had initially allowed ticket price hikes despite previous criticisms regarding public safety.”

This decision emphasizes the government's commitment to public safety following incidents in recent screenings.
newTitle: Telangana Government Withdraws Ticket Price Hike for 'Game Changer'

Vanangaan, featuring Arun Vijay and Roshini Prakash, opened on January 10, 2025, with a gross of Rs 1 crore in Tamil Nadu on its first day.

  • The film was directed by Bala.
  • It competes against other releases like Madraskaaran, Game Changer, and Fateh.
  • Arun Vijay replaced Suriya in the lead role due to storyline changes.
  • The film is expected to grow its business during the Pongal weekend.

title: Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Continues 7 Crore+ Streak On Saturday! - Koimoi
summary:
Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Continues 7 Crore+ Streak On Saturday!

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Koimoi

Ram Charan’s latest film, Game Changer, continues to perform well at the box office, with promising early estimates for its second day.

  • Day 1 earnings were strong at 54 crores net across all languages in India.
  • The Hindi version opened particularly well, earning 8.64 crores.
  • On Day 2, it is estimated to earn between 7-7.50 crores.
  • This reflects a drop of 18-13% from its opening day but maintains a strong total.
  • Game Changer competes with Jr NTR’s Devara, which collected 17.45 crores over two days.
“Despite a regular working Friday, Shankar’s directorial made a stunning opening.”

The film is attracting decent reviews and positive word-of-mouth, promising continued interest.

title: Mandy Moore hits back at critics who slammed her for family's LA fire relief fundraiser: ‘Kindly F off’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Mandy Moore Defends Family's Fire Relief Fundraiser Amid Criticism

Date: Jan 11, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Actress Mandy Moore has responded to criticism regarding her family's fire relief fundraiser on social media. Moore shared a GoFundMe link to help her brother-in-law and sister-in-law, Griff and Kit, after they lost their home to the Eaton Fire, highlighting the immediate need for support as they prepare for their first child.

  • Moore's family was affected by the Eaton Fire, which devastated their home.
  • She emphasized their urgent need for help with a baby on the way.
  • Moore faced backlash for promoting the fundraiser, to which she responded strongly.
  • She pointed out that the couple's situation is dire, as Griff, a musician, lost his tools of trade.
  • Moore urged her followers to contribute and show empathy rather than criticism.
“Kindly F OFF. no one is forcing you to do anything.”

In conclusion, Mandy Moore expresses the importance of community support and emotional resilience during such challenging times.
newTitle: Mandy Moore Defends Family's Fire Relief Fundraiser Amid Criticism

title: Rekhachithram Box Office Collection Day 3 - Sacnilk
summary:
Rekhachithram Box Office Collection Day 3

Publication Date: January 11, 2025

Source: Sacnilk

Rekhachithram performed well at the box office, earning an estimated ₹4.10 Cr in its first two days. On the third day, the film earned around ₹3.25 Cr (early estimates).

Key Points

  • Day 1 collection: ₹1.9 Cr
  • Day 2 collection: ₹2.2 Cr (15.79% increase)
  • Day 3 collection: ₹3.25 Cr (early estimates)
  • Total collection after 3 days: ₹7.35 Cr
  • Overall Malayalam occupancy: 61.32%

Day 3 Malayalam (2D) Occupancy

  • Morning Shows: 38.84%
  • Afternoon Shows: 56.70%
  • Evening Shows: 69.52%
  • Night Shows: 80.21%
"Rekhachithram had an overall 61.32% Malayalam Occupancy on Saturday."

About This Movie: Directed by Jofin T. Chacko and produced by Kavya Film Company and Ann Mega Media, the film stars Asif Ali, Anaswara Rajan, Manoj K. Jayan, and Siddique.

Disclaimer: The Box Office Data are compiled from various sources and are approximate.

title: Shalini Passi lost sensation in spine and legs after giving birth at 20: ‘Doctor said, for the rest of your life…’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Shalini Passi lost sensation in spine and legs after giving birth at 20: ‘Doctor said, for the rest of your life…’

Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

Shalini Passi shares her journey of overcoming physical limitations after giving birth at a young age, defying medical advice to regain her mobility.

  • Shalini Passi lost sensation in her spine and legs after childbirth.
  • She was advised by her doctor to receive spine injections and refrain from dancing.
  • Determined to regain her abilities, she pursued alternate therapies including Yoga and muscle training.
  • Her doctor expressed surprise at her recovery, calling it a miracle.
“My doctor said, ‘You will have to get an injection in your spine for the rest of your life’…”

Shalini’s story highlights her determination and the importance of alternative therapies in recovery, fostering a close bond with her son throughout their journey.
newTitle: Shalini Passi Overcomes Loss of Sensation After Childbirth

title: Shark Tank India 4 pitcher with 400 acres of family land puts Anupam Mittal ‘in his place’, gets called ‘laadli’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Shark Tank India 4 pitcher with 400 acres of family land puts Anupam Mittal ‘in his place’, gets called ‘laadli’

Publication Date: January 10, 2025
Source: Indian Express

The fourth season of Shark Tank India has begun with notable pitches, including a memorable one from cousins Preeti and Sayali for their jaggery brand, Gudworld. They sought Rs 50 lakh for a 2% equity stake in their company.

  • Preeti’s effective communication impressed all the sharks.
  • Vineeta Singh and Aman Gupta had differing opinions on the business strategy.
  • Aman ultimately offered Rs 50 lakh for a 6% equity stake.
  • Preeti negotiated and accepted a counteroffer of 5% equity.
  • Anupam Mittal referred to Preeti as 'laadli' after their discussion.
“You are the king of e-commerce, and we would really value your mentorship.” – Preeti

The pitch showcased the potential and resources available to the entrepreneurs, leading to a successful investment deal.
newTitle: Shark Tank India 4: Cousins Impress Sharks with Jaggery Pitch

title: Sameer Wankhede reacts to Aryan Khan’s alleged intoxicated video from New Year’s party, says he can’t be threatened by troll armies: ‘I’ve faced terrorists’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Sameer Wankhede reacts to Aryan Khan’s alleged intoxicated video from New Year’s party, says he can’t be threatened by troll armies: ‘I’ve faced terrorists’

Date: January 11, 2025

Source: The Indian Express

In a recent interview, Sameer Wankhede discusses the backlash he faced after Aryan Khan's arrest, his views on trolling, and comments on the alleged intoxication video of Aryan Khan from a New Year’s party.

  • Sameer Wankhede was involved in Aryan Khan's arrest in 2021 for an alleged drug case.
  • Wankhede insists that online trolling does not affect him, stating, “Trolling is entertainment for me.”
  • He addressed the video of Aryan Khan reportedly being drunk, suggesting that the New Year’s celebration culture promotes excessive drinking.
  • Wankhede highlighted the importance of enforcing law equally for all.
  • He dismissed speculation regarding Shah Rukh Khan’s attitude post-arrest and remarked he hasn’t been following SRK’s actions.
“I have faced much worse: bullets, terrorists. These are very small things.”

Wankhede believes in the integrity of the law and notes that the absence of drugs at the time of arrest does not exempt individuals from charges related to drug distribution.
newTitle: Sameer Wankhede Responds to Aryan Khan's New Year's Party Video

title: Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 1: Ram Charan-starrer’s Rs 186 crore debut disputed, analysts allege Rs 100 crore inflation - The Indian Express
summary:
Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 1

Date: January 11, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

S Shankar’s highly anticipated film, Game Changer, starring Ram Charan, has seen a strong opening at the box office, though its reported collection figures are disputed.

  • The film collected Rs 51.25 crore in India on its opening day.
  • It surpassed Ram Charan’s previous solo release, Vinaya Vidheya Rama, which made Rs 34 crore.
  • Allegations have arisen of Rs 100 crore inflation in reported collections.
  • The film achieved an impressive occupancy rate, particularly in its morning and 4DX afternoon shows.
The king’s arrival is setting the box office ablaze! #GameChanger takes a blockbuster opening at the BOX OFFICE 💥💥 GROSSES 186 CRORES WORLDWIDE on Day 1 ❤‍🔥

The director, S Shankar, hopes this film will perform better than his previous release, Indian 2, which only grossed Rs 25.6 crore on its opening day.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 1: Controversial Rs 186 Crore Debut

title: After HC rap, Telangana govt withdraws orders on ‘Game Changer’ ticket price hike - Telangana Today
summary:
After HC Rap, Telangana Govt Withdraws Orders on 'Game Changer' Ticket Price Hike

Published Date: 11 January 2025, 10:04 PM | Source: Telangana Today

The Telangana government has decided to withdraw its orders for a hike in ticket prices and additional morning shows for the movie 'Game Changer' due to public safety concerns following an incident at another film screening.

  • The government will not allow early morning shows until public interest and safety are evaluated.
  • This decision came after the High Court directed the state government to reconsider its previous decision to increase ticket prices and allow extra shows.
  • Initially, permission was granted for an additional show and a ticket price hike of Rs 100 for multiplexes and Rs 50 for standalone theatres.
  • Previous incidents related to ticket pricing and early screenings have raised public concern.
  • The Chief Minister reiterated that the government would not allow further price hikes or benefit shows.
“The orders were issued following the High Court’s directions to reconsider the hike in ticket prices.”

This withdrawal reflects the government's commitment to public safety and interests in light of recent incidents.
newTitle: Telangana Government Withdraws Ticket Price Hike for 'Game Changer' Movie

summary:
Park Sung Hoon Leaves Upcoming Drama Directed by 'My Love From The Star' Director

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: SOOMPI

Park Sung Hoon has exited his role in the upcoming drama “The Tyrant’s Chef” following controversy.

  • He was initially offered the male lead role alongside YoonA.
  • Controversy arose when he posted a controversial image on social media.
  • His agency clarified the incident but backlash led to calls for him to step down.
  • Studio Dragon announced the mutual decision for him not to join the project.
  • No new casting plans or schedule have been set yet.
“The actor and his agency expressed their apologies several times regarding the recent events.”

The departure of Park Sung Hoon raises questions about the future of the drama and its cast.

title: Game Changer Hindi Box Box Office: Biggest Year-Opener Post-COVID With 423% Higher Earnings – Ram Charan Breaks 3 Major Records! - Koimoi
summary:
Game Changer Hindi Box Office Achieves Record Year-Opener Post-COVID

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Koimoi

Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan, has opened with remarkable success, earning ₹8.64 crore on its first day, marking the biggest year-opener at the box office since the COVID pandemic.

  • Game Changer outperformed the previous record held by Badhaai Do, which opened at ₹1.65 crore in 2022.
  • The film's earnings are reported to be 423% higher than Badhaai Do.
  • Game Changer is now the second biggest Sankranti opener in the last 10 years.
  • It has broken three major records in its opening day performance.
  • Game Changer's opening day earnings were 146% higher than Ram Charan’s last Hindi film, Zanjeer, which earned ₹3.5 crore in 2013.
“Ram Charan has delivered the biggest year-opener at the box office post-COVID.”

This impressive box office performance indicates a strong recovery for the film industry and a significant resumption of audience interest in cinema following the pandemic.
newTitle: Game Changer Hindi Box Office Achieves Record Year-Opener Post-COVID

title: Manisha Koirala drops a hint about companion in her life: ‘Who said I don’t have one’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Manisha Koirala hints at having a companion in her life

Date: Jan 11, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Manisha Koirala has recently made waves with her commentary on personal relationships. In a recent interview, she expressed that she doesn't wish to compromise her quality of life for a companion.

  • In a subtle hint, she questioned the assumption that she is single.
  • Manisha emphasized her focus on maintaining a fulfilling life, suggesting that a relationship should complement, not change, her current situation.
  • She reflected on her past marriage and her journey since overcoming cancer, highlighting a shift towards balance and freedom in her life.
“Who said I don’t have one? … I don’t want to compromise and let go of the quality of life that I have.”

This candid discussion sheds light on Koirala's current mindset, suggesting that while she remains open to companionship, her well-being and independence come first.
newTitle: Manisha Koirala hints at having a companion in her life

summary:

Published on Jan 11, 2025 9:05 pm IST

Sukumar, a prominent figure in the Telugu film industry, is celebrating his 55th birthday and has started working on the script for his next project featuring Ram Charan.

  • Sukumar is known for his successful film, Pushpa, whose sequel has gained global attention.
  • He is currently on a break in the US after working on Pushpa 2 for two years.
  • The upcoming project is expected to showcase Ram Charan in a new role and is described as a rustic drama.
  • Fans and industry peers are celebrating Sukumar's birthday and wishing him success in future endeavors.
"He has undoubtedly made the Telugu film industry proud."

This birthday marks a significant moment for Sukumar as he embarks on new creative endeavors in 2025.

title: From Sookshmadarshini to Miss You to I Am Kathalan: New Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu OTT releases to watch on - The Economic Times
summary:
From Sookshmadarshini to Miss You to I Am Kathalan: New Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu OTT releases to watch

Date: This week

Source: Panache Magazine

This week brings an exciting array of South Indian films premiering on OTT platforms, offering the perfect opportunity to enjoy fresh releases from the comfort of your home.

  • Sookshmadarshini: A gripping thriller about a small-town homemaker entangled in a web of suspicion after her neighbor's mother disappears. Streaming on Disney Plus Hotstar.
  • Miss You: A romantic drama featuring Siddharth and Ashika Ranganath available on Amazon Prime Video.
  • I Am Kathalan: A story of a college student overcoming challenges, set to premiere on ManoramaMAX on January 17, 2024.
  • Bachchala Malli: A Telugu film streaming on ETV Win featuring Allari Naresh.
  • Pani: Premiering on SonyLIV on January 16, 2025, this series follows real estate ambitions and challenges.
  • Break Out: A Telugu film about a filmmaker confronting his fears, available on ETV Win.
  • Neeli Megha Shyama: A romantic drama exploring life-altering experiences, streaming on Aha.
  • Hide N Seek: A gripping Telugu thriller revolving around mysterious suicides now available on Aha.

These films promise a mix of suspense, drama, and entertainment for movie enthusiasts.

Notable Quotes:

“These films offer a mix of suspense, drama, and entertainment, making them a must-watch.”

The new OTT releases cater to diverse tastes and are a testament to the rich storytelling tradition of South Indian cinema.
newTitle: New Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu OTT Releases to Watch

title: Game Changer box office collection day 2 (updated live): Ram Charan-Shankar film sees dip in collections - Hindustan Times
summary:
Game Changer box office collection day 2 (updated live): Shankar's Ram Charan film sees dip in collections

Date: Jan 11, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Shankar’s new film Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, collected ₹17.92 crore on its second day, bringing its total to ₹68.92 crore amid stiff competition during the festival season.

  • The film was released on January 10 and has received mixed reviews.
  • It is competing with other notable Sankranthi releases.
  • Despite high expectations, the occupancy rates were only decent compared to previous works by Shankar.
“Game Changer had high expectations but now faces stiff competition from newly released films.”

This film showcases Ram Charan in dual roles as an IAS officer and an activist, portraying significant political themes in its narrative.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 2: Ram Charan's Film Sees a Dip
